prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Chromatic Percussion, Piano, Guitar, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Bass, Chromatic Percussion, Piano, and Guitar, but no Drums.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Bass, Chromatic Percussion, Piano, and Guitar, but Drums are absent.

Style 3:
This composition is made up of Bass, Chromatic Percussion, Piano, and Guitar, omitting Drums.
